(In character)

Thisss isss why ssso many Rpg'sss fail. It isss good to remember thisss. 
"Ssstoriesss can alwaysss be retold, but friendssshipsss, and alliesss are to 
be treasssured, think of them asss gemsss, and try not to let them ssslip 
through your fingersss." Thatsss all thisss sssnakesss got to sssay.

--part1_94.37290480.2be5bbc7_boundary
